post.description: The endpoint to get a user cart, and the items in the cart

x-enum-comments.CartActive: cart has been created and active
x-enum-comments.CartInactive: cart has been inactivated and no longer active due to check out or session expiry

x-enum-comments.OrderCompleted: order has been processed and delivered, and verified by the customer
x-enum-comments.OrderPending: order has been created and processing
x-enum-comments.OrderRejected: order was rejected by vendor or customer
